label: ProductionWasteRecoveryDisposalProcess
comment: A process of either regaining waste substances in usable form, or of getting rid of waste substances resulting from production.

objectProperties.comment: A textual description of this production waste recovery disposal process.
A process certificate specified for this production waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the type of production waste recovery disposal process.

referencedBy.comment: A production waste recovery disposal process applicable to this production waste material.
